StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: proc_markscard_sub_cnt
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: create or replace PROCEDURE proc_markscard_sub_cnt ( p_school_code IN VARCHAR, p_batch_no IN DATE, p_class_code IN VARCHAR2, p_term_code IN VARCHAR2, p_count IN OUT NUMBER ) AS CURSOR cur ( p_school_code VARCHAR2, p_batch_no DATE, p_class_code VARCHAR2, p_term_code VARCHAR2 ) IS SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT school_code, batch_no, class_code, term_code, subject FROM mvc_marksheet WHERE school_code = p_school_code AND batch_no = p_batch_no AND class_code = p_class_code AND term_code = p_term_code GROUP BY school_code, batch_no, class_code, term_code, subject ); BEGIN OPEN cur(p_school_code, p_batch_no, p_class_code, p_term_code); FETCH cur INTO p_count; CLOSE cur; END;
